text: Al-Rafidain TV is a Iraqi TV channel from Istanbul broadcasting in the Arabic language. The channel was launched on the 10th of April 2006 using Nilesat, and is owned by followers of Sunnism against secularism that support the Association of Muslim Scholars in Iraq. ==References== Category:Television channels in Iraq Category:Television stations Category:Arabic-language television stations
title: Al-Rafidain TV
